md:
giải nghĩa từ "cans" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

1. Can (noun) - Lon, thùng
	* Meaning: A container made of metal, plastic, or glass, used for storing food or drinks.
	* Example sentence: "Please put the soda in the can and put it in the fridge."
	* Related words: bottle, jar, container
	* Antonyms: none

2. Can (verb) - Có thể, làm được
	* Meaning: To be able to do something; to have the ability or skill to do something.
	* Example sentence: "I can speak three languages fluently."
	* Related words: able, capable, skilled
	* Antonyms: cannot, unable, incapable

3. Can (auxiliary verb) - Có thể, được phép
	* Meaning: Used to express permission, possibility, or ability.
	* Example sentence: "You can go to the party if you want to."
	* Related words: may, might, shall
	* Antonyms: cannot, may not, must not

Note: The meanings of "can" can be different depending on the context and the sentence structure.

  1. Can (noun) - Lon, thùng

    • Meaning: A container made of metal, plastic, or glass, used for storing food or drinks.
    • Example sentence: "Please put the soda in the can and put it in the fridge."

    • Antonyms: none

  2. Can (verb) - Có thể, làm được

    • Meaning: To be able to do something; to have the ability or skill to do something.
    • Example sentence: "I can speak three languages fluently."
    • Related words: able, capable, skilled
    • Antonyms: cannot, unable, incapable

  3. Can (auxiliary verb) - Có thể, được phép

    • Meaning: Used to express permission, possibility, or ability.
    • Example sentence: "You can go to the party if you want to."
    • Related words: may, might, shall
    • Antonyms: cannot, may not, must not

Note: The meanings of "can" can be different depending on the context and the sentence structure.
